revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] to [[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP (ER-X-SFP)]]
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=X SFP (ER-X-SFP) |ean=0810354022203 |asin=B012X45WH6, B014RL14K2 |price=79 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manif= |availability=now |est_release_date=04/2015 |type=router |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_poe=passive |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML02G200TFI00 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=CFeon |fla2_model=EN25QH16-104GIP |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16FP-DI |expansion_if_types=SFP |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (57600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1A; |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=16-bit I2C-bus I/O Port Expander;NXP;PCA9555A;;1; ,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;1; ,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;1; ,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AON7446;;5; ,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Unisonic;UT4421G;;5; |flags=SFP, PoE in/out, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink;v4.3.5.0; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14-UBNT;EdgeOS;v1.6.6; |tp_firmware=Padavan (unofficially) |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=04:18:D6 }} {{TagLine|Advanced Gigabit Router with PoE and SFP}} :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-x-sfp/ Product page] (ER-X-SFP)
[http://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_X_DS.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeRouter_ER-X-SFP_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/download/?group=edgerouter-x-sfp Firmware Download]
